summary.para: Contains functionality related to Twitter REST API.

In order to use the commands for this addin, include the following in your build.cake file to download and reference from NuGet.org:
#addin Cake.Twitter

member.name: M:Cake.Twitter.TwitterProvider.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Creates an object for sending tweets to Twitter using Single-user OAuth.
Get your access keys by creating an app at apps.twitter.com then visiting the "Keys and Access Tokens" section for your app. They can be found under the "Your Access Token" heading.

member.summary: Sends a tweet with the supplied text and returns the response from the Twitter API.
